name: Scrap Mechanic: Rocket Game
description:
Welcome to the machine-filled creative paradise of Scrap Mechanic, a matching game with imagination and ingenuity at its core. Create fantastic machines, transforming vehicles or sneaky traps. The possibilities are endless with Scrap Mechanics powerful tools.


***Scrap Mechanic: Rocket Game***

+ An excellent way of recognizing the Scrap Mechanic's fantastic machines, transforming vehicles or sneaky traps!

+ Challenge other players around the world.

+ Play with bots.

+ Go up and get excited with more advanced levels.

Great game!!! What are we waiting for? Let’s download and enjoy the game!!!
